summary: REQ-3 and REQ-4 appear implemented by moving post-login navigation into a routed component (RootLayout) via a new PostLoginRedirector that uses TanStack Router hooks inside router context, and by adding guards (auth/profile readiness, loop prevention, and session-based one-time redirect) before calling navigate.

hallucinated_features.description: Redirect to /connect includes a hard-coded search preset (preset: 'brandmeister-dmr') and a console log message.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest/AC require preventing the null navigate crash and adding defensive guards/one-time redirect behavior, but do not explicitly request adding a preset query parameter or logging.
